item.source: Youtube 79 Billion views glitch *YOUTUBE FIXED IT*

item.title: Youtube 79 Billion views glitch *YOUTUBE FIXED IT*
item.dc:creator: @inertia inertia
item.description:
@inertia wrote:

[quote=“abraham2119, post:25, topic:324187”][quote author=inertia link=topic=420592.msg3089672#msg3089672 date=1262792428]
Well it was uploaded in september, so that’s plenty of time to use bots by proxy - even if youtube do only allow one hit per ip per day. It doesn’t sound reasonable that you could ‘hack’ a hit counter…

Hmm, just calculated it - if you’re allowed one hit per 12 hours then they would have needed around 325x10[sup]6[/sup] bots. Maybe there is a shorter ‘hit per ip’ limit, or maybe it really is a glitch!!!
[/quote]you do know that you could just setup a proxy server on a box that would change its ip after every request, assuming its ip is dynamic[/quote]
Oh right yeh forgot about dynamic ip’s

Read full topic
item.source: Youtube 79 Billion views glitch *YOUTUBE FIXED IT*

[quote=“inertia, post:11, topic:324187”]Well it was uploaded in september, so that’s plenty of time to use bots by proxy - even if youtube do only allow one hit per ip per day. It doesn’t sound reasonable that you could ‘hack’ a hit counter…

Hmm, just calculated it - if you’re allowed one hit per 12 hours then they would have needed around 325x10[sup]6[/sup] bots. Maybe there is a shorter ‘hit per ip’ limit, or maybe it really is a glitch!!![/quote]you do know that you could just setup a proxy server on a box that would change its ip after every request, assuming its ip is dynamic

item.title: Youtube 79 Billion views glitch *YOUTUBE FIXED IT*
item.dc:creator: @inertia inertia
item.description:
@inertia wrote:

Well it was uploaded in september, so that’s plenty of time to use bots by proxy - even if youtube do only allow one hit per ip per day. It doesn’t sound reasonable that you could ‘hack’ a hit counter…

Hmm, just calculated it - if you’re allowed one hit per 12 hours then they would have needed around 325x10[sup]6[/sup] bots. Maybe there is a shorter ‘hit per ip’ limit, or maybe it really is a glitch!!!
